text: Béatrice Pavy-Morançais (born October 14, 1958) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Sarthe department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Béatrice Pavy-Morançais
